```{r}
colstoselect <- c("Name", "PlayerID", "Season", "Age", "ERA", "IP", "PA", "BB", "SO", "AVG", "SLG", "OBP", "wRAA", "FIPAdjMinus")

pitchingstats2021_selected <- pitchingstats2021[, colstoselect]
pitchingstats2022_selected <- pitchingstats2022[, colstoselect]
pitchingstats2023_selected <- pitchingstats2023[, colstoselect]
pitchingstats2024_selected <- pitchingstats2024[, colstoselect]
```

```{r}
pitchingstats2021_selected <- pitchingstats2021_selected %>%
  mutate(BBRate = BB/ PA) %>%
  mutate(SORate = SO/ PA) 
pitchingstats2022_selected <- pitchingstats2022_selected %>%
  mutate(BBRate = BB/ PA) %>%
  mutate(SORate = SO/ PA)
pitchingstats2023_selected <- pitchingstats2023_selected %>%
  mutate(BBRate = BB/ PA) %>%
  mutate(SORate = SO/ PA)

pitchingstats2024_selected <- pitchingstats2024_selected %>%
  mutate(BBRate = BB/ PA) %>%
  mutate(SORate = SO/ PA)
```

```{r}
numeric_columns <- c("IP", "PA", "ERA", "AVG","OBP", "SLG", "wRAA", "BBRate", "SORate", "FIPAdjMinus")

pitching_stats_2023_weighted <- pitchingstats2023_selected[, numeric_columns] * 5
pitching_stats_2022_weighted <- pitchingstats2022_selected[, numeric_columns] * 4
pitching_stats_2021_weighted <- pitchingstats2021_selected[, numeric_columns] * 3
```

```{r}
pitching_stats_2021_weighted <- cbind(pitchingstats2021_selected[, setdiff(names(pitchingstats2021_selected), numeric_columns)], pitching_stats_2021_weighted)
pitching_stats_2022_weighted <- cbind(pitchingstats2022_selected[, setdiff(names(pitchingstats2022_selected), numeric_columns)], pitching_stats_2022_weighted)
pitching_stats_2023_weighted <- cbind(pitchingstats2023_selected[, setdiff(names(pitchingstats2023_selected), numeric_columns)], pitching_stats_2023_weighted)
```


```{r}
combined_stats <- left_join(pitching_stats_2021_weighted, pitching_stats_2022_weighted, by = "PlayerID", suffix = c("_2021", "_2022"))

combined_stats <- left_join(combined_stats, pitching_stats_2023_weighted, by = "PlayerID", suffix = c("", "_2023"))
combined_stats_filter <- combined_stats %>%
  filter(!is.na(PA_2021) & !is.na(PA_2022) & !is.na(PA))
combined_stats_unique <- combined_stats_filter %>%
  distinct(Name, .keep_all = TRUE)
```

```{r}
combined_stats_weighted <- combined_stats_unique %>%
  mutate(weighted_IP = (IP_2021 + IP_2022 + IP) / 12) %>%
  mutate(weighted_PA = (PA_2021 + PA_2022 + PA) / 12) %>%
  mutate(weighted_BBRate = (BBRate_2021 + BBRate_2022 + BBRate) / 12) %>%
  mutate(weighted_SORate = (SORate_2021 + SORate_2022 + SORate) / 12) %>%
  mutate(weighted_ERA = (ERA_2021 + ERA_2022 + ERA) / 12) %>%
  mutate(weighted_AVG = (AVG_2021 + AVG_2022 + AVG) / 12) %>%
  mutate(weighted_SLG = (SLG_2021 + SLG_2022 + SLG) / 12) %>%
  mutate(weighted_OBP = (OBP_2021 + OBP_2022 + OBP) / 12) %>%
  mutate(weighted_FIPAdjMinus = (FIPAdjMinus_2021 + FIPAdjMinus_2022 + FIPAdjMinus) / 12)
#%>%
 # mutate(weighted_wRAA = (wRAA_2021 + wRAA_2022 + wRAA) / 12)
```

```{r}
weighted_stats <- combined_stats_weighted %>%
  select(Name, PlayerID,weighted_IP,weighted_PA, weighted_BBRate, weighted_SORate, weighted_ERA, weighted_AVG, weighted_SLG, weighted_OBP,weighted_OBP, weighted_FIPAdjMinus
      #   ,weighted_wRAA
         ) %>%
  filter(weighted_PA >= 100)
```

```{r}
merged_stats_w_2024 <- left_join(pitchingstats2024_selected, weighted_stats, by = c("PlayerID", "Name"))
merged_stats_w_2024 <- merged_stats_w_2024 %>%
  filter(!is.na(weighted_PA))
```

```{r}
#Age Adjustment for stats that increase as you improve
age_adjustment <- function(age) {
  ifelse(is.na(age), 1,
    ifelse(age <= 0, 1,
      ifelse(age > 29, 1 / (1 + 0.003 * (age - 29)),
        1 + 0.015 * (29 - age)
      )
    )
  )
}
```

```{r}
#Age Adjustment for stats that decrease as you improve
age_adjustment_reciprocal <- function(age) {
  ifelse(is.na(age), 1,
    ifelse(age <= 0, 1,
  ifelse (age > 29, 1 + 0.003 * (age-29),
    1/(1 + 0.015 * (29-age)
    )
  )
    )
  )
}
```


```{r}
merged_stats_w_2024 <- merged_stats_w_2024 %>%
  mutate(age_adjustment_factor = age_adjustment(Age),
         age_reciprocal = age_adjustment_reciprocal(Age)) %>%
  filter(PA>=100)
```

```{r}
age_adj_stats_w_2024 <- merged_stats_w_2024 %>%
  mutate(proj_AVG = weighted_AVG * age_adjustment_reciprocal(Age)) %>%
  mutate(proj_OBP = weighted_OBP * age_adjustment_reciprocal(Age)) %>%
  mutate(proj_SLG = weighted_SLG * age_adjustment_reciprocal(Age)) %>%
  mutate(proj_BBRate = weighted_BBRate * age_adjustment_reciprocal(Age)) %>%
  mutate(proj_SORate = weighted_SORate * age_adjustment(Age)) %>%
  mutate(proj_FIPAdjMinus = weighted_FIPAdjMinus * age_adjustment_reciprocal(Age)) %>%
  mutate(proj_ERA = weighted_ERA * age_adjustment_reciprocal(Age)) 
 # mutate(proj_wRAA = weighted_wRAA * age_adjustment_reciprocal(Age))
```

```{r}
age_adj_stats_w_2024 <- age_adj_stats_w_2024 %>%
  mutate(perc_diff_AVG = ((AVG - proj_AVG) / AVG) * 100,
         perc_diff_OBP = ((OBP - proj_OBP) / OBP) * 100,
         perc_diff_SLG = ((SLG - proj_SLG) / SLG) * 100,
         perc_diff_BBRate = ((BBRate - proj_BBRate) / BBRate) * 100,
         perc_diff_SORate = ((SORate - proj_SORate) / SORate) * 100,
         perc_diff_ERA = ((ERA - proj_ERA) / ERA) * 100,
         #perc_diff_wRAA = ((wRAA - proj_wRAA) / wRAA) * 100,
         perc_diff_FIPAdjMinus = ((FIPAdjMinus - proj_FIPAdjMinus) / FIPAdjMinus) *100)
```

```{r}
age_adj_stats_w_2024 <- age_adj_stats_w_2024 %>%
  mutate(total_perc_diff = perc_diff_AVG + perc_diff_OBP + perc_diff_SLG + 
                            perc_diff_BBRate + perc_diff_SORate + perc_diff_ERA + perc_diff_FIPAdjMinus)
```

```{r}
age_adj_stats_w_2024_unique <- age_adj_stats_w_2024 %>%
  distinct(Name, .keep_all = TRUE)
model_performance_2024 <- age_adj_stats_w_2024_unique %>%
  summarise(sum_perc_diff = sum(total_perc_diff)/nrow(age_adj_stats_w_2024_unique))
model_performance_2024
```

```{r}
# Linear regression models
model_avg <- lm(AVG ~ proj_AVG, data = age_adj_stats_w_2024_unique)
model_obp <- lm(OBP ~ proj_OBP, data = age_adj_stats_w_2024_unique)
model_slg <- lm(SLG ~ proj_SLG, data = age_adj_stats_w_2024_unique)

# Summarize models
summary(model_avg)
summary(model_obp)
summary(model_slg)

# Scatter plot with linear regression line for AVG
ggplot(age_adj_stats_w_2024_unique, aes(x = proj_AVG, y = AVG)) +
  geom_point(color = "blue") +
  geom_smooth(method = "lm", se = FALSE, color = "black") +
  labs(title = "Actual vs Projected AVG",
       x = "Projected AVG",
       y = "Actual AVG") +
  theme_minimal()

# Scatter plot with linear regression line for OBP
ggplot(age_adj_stats_w_2024_unique, aes(x = proj_OBP, y = OBP)) +
  geom_point(color = "blue") +
```
